2025.query: Synopsys SNPS competitors 2025 EDA electronic design automation
2025.context: Synopsys, Inc. is a electronic design automation company focused on chip design software, IP, and software security. EDA and simulation leader. Essential for AI chip design.

competitors.name: Cadence Design Systems
competitors.notes: Primary competitor with approximately 30% market share (matching Synopsys). Both companies dominate the semiconductor EDA software space. Customers often use both to create best-of-breed toolsets and play pricing off each other. In December 2024, Nvidia announced a multi-year strategic partnership and $2 billion investment in Synopsys.

competitors.name: Siemens EDA
competitors.notes: Formerly Mentor Graphics, acquired by Siemens. Third-largest player with approximately 13% market share. Benefits from integration with Siemens' broader industrial and manufacturing software, providing better services to automotive and industrial customers. Announced AI-enabled EDA suite in June 2025 at Design Automation Conference.

competitors.name: ANSYS
competitors.notes: Acquired by Synopsys on July 17, 2025 for approximately $35 billion. Global provider of engineering simulation software. This was the largest acquisition in Synopsys' history.

competitors.name: Empyrean
competitors.notes: China's largest domestic EDA vendor. Part of China's investment in their EDA ecosystem, though still very small compared to Synopsys and Cadence.

competitors.name: Emerging EDA Startups
competitors.notes: New EDA startups include Alpha Design, Caspia, PrimisAI, Quilter, Rise Design Automation, Silimate, and Suitera.
